snippet: Hostess Brands, the baking company best known for its sweet treats like Twinkies and Ding Dongs, filed for bankruptcy just three years after emerging from an earlier restructuring process.
abstract: Hostess Brands, the baking company best known for its sweet treats like Twinkies and Ding Dongs, filed for bankruptcy just three years after emerging from an earlier restructuring process.

headline.main: Hostess, Maker of Twinkies, Files for Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Hostess Brands, Twinkies Maker, Files for Bankruptcy
